Author: attick
Name: Mouseover Action
Description: This plugin allows for actions to be used on mouseover targets without a macro.

Author: meli
Name: Orchestrion Plugin
Description: Adds a simple front-end for browsing and changing the in-game BGM

Author: attick
Name: Title Edit
Description: This plugin allows for the title screen to be changed to any expac's title screen.

Author: attick
Name: XIV Combo
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.
